phrases.phrase: 캠핑 장소로 지정되지 않은 구역에서의 야영은 금지되어 있습니다.
meanings: 공원 You are not allowed to camp in areas that are not designated camping areas.

vlive.korean: 그리고... 야영! Then... a camp! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] TAEMIN​ X Rooftop Live - MOVE Night
그러면 여기서 캠핑을 하시나봐. 야영, 야영. I guess people camp out here. Camping. 듣기 View video Cookat X Idol : [매떠여 EXO] 매떠여 시즌1- 본편 #6
vlive.english: I guess people camp out here. Camping.

vlive.korean: 여기서 야영하시나봐. I guess they come for camping here. 듣기 View video Cookat X Idol : [매떠여 EXO] 매떠여 시즌1- 본편 #6
vlive.english: I guess they come for camping here.

vlive.korean: 저 야영해도 돼요, 실장님? Can I do camping here, Executive? 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : BLOOMY - 블루미 '날씨야 누가 이기나 해보자!!'
vlive.english: Can I do camping here, Executive?

vlive.korean: 자 역시 야영의 꽃은 캠프파이어지? Aren't campfires the best part about camping? 듣기 View video 초등학생 관심거리연구소 (Super Cool Kids Lab) : 초간단드라마EP12_오해와이해사이_하
vlive.english: Aren't campfires the best part about camping?

examples.korean: They pitched camp for the night near the river. 발음듣기 그들은 그 강가에서 밤사이 야영을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They pitched camp for the night near the river. 발음

examples.korean: The campers had trampled the corn down. 발음듣기 야영객들이 옥수수를 밟아 짓뭉개 놓은 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The campers had trampled the corn down. 발음

examples.korean: The campsite was deluged by a flash flood. 발음듣기 갑자기 밀어닥친 홍수로 그 야영장이 물에 잠겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The campsite was deluged by a flash flood. 발음

examples.korean: The facilities on the campsite were very primitive. 발음듣기 그 야영장의 시설은 대단히 원시적이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The facilities on the campsite were very primitive. 발음

examples.korean: I camped overnight in a field. 발음듣기 나는 들판에서 야영을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I camped overnight in a field. 발음
